name: Functional Training
description: Build strength, mobility, and endurance with dynamic movements that prepare your body for real-world activities.

name: CrossFit
description: High-intensity functional fitness combining weightlifting, cardio, and gymnastics in varied workouts.

name: Personal Training
description: One-on-one sessions tailored to your goals, fitness level, and schedule with dedicated trainer support.

name: Yoga & Wellness
description: Find balance, flexibility, and inner peace through our yoga classes designed for all levels.

name: Nutrition Coaching
description: Expert guidance on nutrition, meal planning, and dietary strategies to fuel your fitness journey.

name: Group Classes
description: High-energy group sessions including Zumba, HIIT, and more. Fun, motivating, and effective.
